The researcher, the words, is the one who broke you in the earth, that is, your creation and many of you, not otherwise, glory and exaltation, and for it you will be gathered to the part of the part of it That is and they say from the extent of their Atto and their alienation when this promise, that is, the wilderness of the promise, as it is reported from it, the saying of the Almighty (and to it) The Prophet ï·º and the believers are addressed where they were shared by him, peace and blessings be upon him, in the promise, and the recitation of the verses that are included in him, and the answer to the condition is that While they tell him about the coming of the hour and the wise, then show his time.
